author: Toni Mccowen
comment: Every button arrow button I touch only the middle works

reply.author: Keditek LLC
reply.content: Hi Toni - sorry for the confusion.  This remote works with gestures, swipe to navigate, tap to select.  Its designed that way so you can navigate without taking your eyes off of the television.  Hope it works for you now - if not let us know.  Thanks!

reply.content: Thanks for your feedback - we'll incorporate your comments into the next release.
